channel.title: Poison and Bleeding Mechanic Question
channel.description:
If I poison someone who's already poisoned, will the timer be reset and they die in two more nights or will they still die tonight?
Also if a wolfed person gets poisoned, does the healer get notified of both bleed and poison?
More importantly, if a debauch + tornado combo forces Hunter to wolf a King who has been poisoned by both Butler and Assassin, what notifications will the healer get? :stuck_out_tongue:
